feed.title: Joe Fodera's Atom Feed
feed.subtitle: This is the Atpm feed that I curated from different places around the web. These are some fairly recent items that I found interesting.

entry.title: UTOPIA - Travis Scott
entry.summary: Link to the Travis Scott album.

entry.title: Knicks reportedly filing protest after refs admit mistake on foul call in loss to Rockets
entry.summary: Aaron Holiday makes decisive free throws after foul call on Jalen Brunson, but after review officials say it "should not have been called."

entry.title: Steph Curry adds to pregame trick shot lore with 100-foot tunnel heave
entry.summary: Steph Curry made another jaw-dropping trick shot this week, sinking a 100-foot tunnel heave to add to his ever-growing list.

entry.title: Trio Collects Liberty League Major Awards
entry.summary: The Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute (RPI) men's and women's cross country teams were well represented in the Liberty League's major awards this fall, as senior Cory Kennedy earned the Men's Runner of the Year, freshman Evan Lacey won the Men's Rookie of the Year, and freshman Julianne Bleskoski was named the Women's Co-Rookie of the Year.

entry.title: Purdy, Bosa, Kittle and More Reflect on the 2023 Season and Super Bowl Run
entry.summary: Several San Francisco 49ers players shared their final thoughts on the 2023 season and the team’s Super Bowl LVIII journey.
